item.title: A Note on SSL Certificate
item.description: This is a note about the Linkedin learning course SSL Certificates for Web Developers. Certificate and protocol What are SSL/TLS stands for? They stands for Secure Socket Layer and Transport Layer Security. They are the protocol names. What is HTTPS, and why we are using it? Https[ecure], a protocol on top of HTTP to secure the integrity of the data sending form the user to server. What is a certificate, and what is it for?
